item.title: Opinion Poll by Ifop–Fiducial for Le Figaro and Sud Radio, 6–9 December 2024 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Nouveau Parti anticapitaliste (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Les Républicains (EPP): 5–8 seats
  • Reconquête (ESN): 0 seats
  • Renaissance–Mouvement démocrate–Horizons (RE): 21–27 seats
  • Parti communiste français (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
  • Parti socialiste–Place Publique (S&D): 0–6 seats
  • Résistons! (*): 0 seats
  • Lutte Ouvrière (*): 0 seats
  • La France insoumise (GUE/NGL): 10–13 seats
  • Les Écologistes – Europe Écologie Les Verts (Greens/EFA): 0–5 seats
  • Debout la France (ECR): 0 seats
  • Rassemblement national (PfE): 33–39 seats
